peliculas.Plot:
A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

They were united by a common purpose, though their backgrounds and abilities were vastly different. Frodo Baggins, the Hobbit, was chosen as the bearer of the Ring, tasked with the most perilous of missions. Alongside him walked his loyal friend Samwise Gamgee, who would not abandon Frodo no matter the cost.
